headline: Interpublic Bolsters Commerce Capabilities with Strategic Appointment of AI Commerce Pioneer Yaniv Sarig
summary: New York, NY, April 09, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Interpublic Group (NYSE: IPG) today announced the appointment of Yaniv Sarig as Global Head of AI Commerce, reinforcing the company’s commitment to advancing systematic commerce solutions for global brands. Sarig, a seasoned entrepreneur and AI commerce pioneer, moves into the role after working with Interpublic in a consulting capacity and will continue reporting to the company’s Global Chief Commerce Strategy Officer, Jeriad Zoghby.
